name: Cthulhu Clicker (itch)
description:
Note: (UPDATE) the progress bar is fixed - I had to change literally 1 number, smh. The update is in 20 past the deadline, so I'll keep the old files here just in case.  (ORIGINAL) The progress bar isn't working correctly. If I'm able to fix it I'll update that here and make it clear which one was the "jam build" and which is the one with the updated progress bar. ALSO if you tab out or scroll away from the window, the music stops playing, my apologies.

Made for the Clicker Jam Winter 2023.

Click your way to oblivion with Cthulhu Clicker.

HOW TO PLAY

You have just discovered the might and wonder of the elder gods. You hope to build your cult around one mission: summoning Cthulhu. Gain 10,000 points to achieve your goal and wreak havoc on this, our mortal plane, and all who live here. All you need to do is click.
